org.mini2Dx.core.geom

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Polygon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollisionPolygon

    public class Polygon
extends Shape
    Implements a rotatable polygon. Adds extra functionality to the default polygon implementation in LibGDX

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(float[] vertices)
        Constructor. Note that vertices must be in a clockwise order for performance and accuracy.
        Parameters:
        vertices - All points in x,y pairs. E.g. x1,y1,x2,y2,etc.

      • Polygon

        public Polygon(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2[] points)
        Constructor with vectors. Note that vectors must be in a clockwise order for performance and accuracy.
        Parameters:
        points - All points in the polygon
